com.serotonin.bacnet4j.event

Class DeviceEventAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.serotonin.bacnet4j.event.DeviceEventAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceEventListener

    public class DeviceEventAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceEventListener
    A default class for easy implementation of the DeviceEventListener interface. Instead of having to implement all of the defined methods, listener classes can override this and only implement the desired methods.
    Author:
    Matthew Lohbihler

      • reinitializeDevice

        public void reinitializeDevice(ReinitializeDeviceRequest.ReinitializedStateOfDevice reinitializedStateOfDevice)
        Description copied from interface: DeviceEventListener
        Notification that the device should be reinitialized. The local device's password has already been validated at this point, the the indicated action should be carried out.
        Specified by:
        reinitializeDevice in interface DeviceEventListener

      • synchronizeTime

        public void synchronizeTime(DateTime dateTime,
                   boolean utc)
        Description copied from interface: DeviceEventListener
        Notification that the device should synchronize its time to the given date/time value. The local device has already been checked at this point to ensure that it supports time synchronization.
        Specified by:
        synchronizeTime in interface DeviceEventListener
        utc - true if a UTCTimeSynchronizationRequest was sent, false if TimeSynchronizationRequest.
